subject: Negotiation
title: Knowing When to Close
description: Learn Knowing When to Close in one minute.

hook.text: A real estate agent lost a $2M deal because she kept talking after the buyer said yes.

buildup.text: Closing is the moment you stop bargaining and lock in the agreement.

discovery.text: They're ready when they discuss implementation, ask about next steps, or lean forward.

twist.text: The biggest mistake isn't pushing too hard â€” it's not seeing when the deal is done.

climax.text: When you hear yes, stop selling. Every extra word risks losing what you won.

punchline.text: When they say yes, stop talking.

quiz.question: What is the most common mistake when closing a deal?
options: Asking for too much at the end
Continuing to talk after the other side agrees
